mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.TLDD_DYYYYMMDD, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AS YYYYMMDD, A.TLDD_CWEEKS AS WEEK, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(A.TLDD_CWORKHOURS) AS WORKHOURS, TMG_F_GET_MGD(A.TLDD_CKUBUN, SYSDATE, TLDD_CCOMPANYID, TLDD_CCOMPANYID, 'ja') AS KUBUN, A.TLDD_CSTARTTIME AS STARTTIME, A.TLDD_CENDTIME AS ENDTIME, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI((NVL(TLDD_CRESTENDTIME1, 0) - NVL(TLDD_CRESTSTARTTIME1, 0)) + (NVL(TLDD_CRESTENDTIME2, 0) - NVL(TLDD_CRESTSTARTTIME2, 0)) + (NVL(TLDD_CRESTENDTIME3, 0) - NVL(TLDD_CRESTSTARTTIME3, 0)) + (NVL(TLDD_CRESTENDTIME4, 0) - NVL(TLDD_CRESTSTARTTIME4, 0))) AS RESTTIME, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(B.WEEKWORKTIME) AS WEEKWORKTIME FROM TMG_LIQUIDATION_DAILY A, ( SELECT SUM(TLDD_CWORKHOURS) AS WEEKWORKTIME, TLDD_CWEEKS AS WEEKS FROM TMG_LIQUIDATION_DAILY WHERE TLDD_CEMPLOYEEID = #{empId} AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TLDD_DYYYYMMDD, 'mm'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{yyyymm} GROUP BY TLDD_CWEEKS ) B WHERE B.WEEKS = A.TLDD_CWEEKS AND TLDD_CEMPLOYEEID = #{empId} AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TLDD_DYYYYMMDD, 'mm'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{yyyymm} ORDER BY A.TLDD_DYYYYMMDD
